dcterms:creator: P. Mathur
R. Shah
R. Sawhney
D. Mahata
dcterms:description: The HEOT dataset consists of 3679 tweets developed using the Twitter Streaming API by gathering specified profane terms in Hinglish language and choosing tweets in Hindi-English code-switched language.
dcterms:title: HEOT Dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Davidson
D. Warmsley
M. Macy
I. Weber
dcterms:description: The English Dataset (Davidson Dataset) consists of 14509 records collected using the Twitter API, which collected samples from 33485 users, resulting in a collection of 85.4 million tweets from which random samples were labeled manually.
dcterms:title: English Dataset (Davidson Dataset)
